title: What is the internet?
post_text: I would like to crawl out of my off the grid cave and learn about the internet. Comment below with your best book recs.

title: The rise of women in tech!
post_text: As and advocate for women, especially in local government, I am pleased to see the increasing number of women in tech!

title: Waffles and other benefits of late night breakfast spots for people in tech.
post_text: The increasing amount of food establishments that stay open late to provide breakfast food, specifically waffles, to those in the tech industry is a huge benefit and encouragment during late night work sessions.

title: The Dark Side of the Web
post_text: Bats, vampires, spider...webs, and zombie dolphins.

title: Website Connectivity Issues and Other Health Diagnosis
post_text: My boss wasn't feeling well today, so I looked up her symptoms on the internet and it said she may have Website Connectivity Issues.
